title: Sick of 20 Minute Queues for nothing
body:
I don't like how the last 2 patches i've been having problems, constant attempting to reconnect spikes, then takes me out for inactivity. LeaverBuster is too strict and doesn't know its right and wrongs. I shouldn't be punished for your servers or your bad patch, i constantly keep getting 5 low priority queues for 20 minutes. I can't wait that long again for 5 games. It is ridiculous for running my computer for an extra 100 minutes just to wait for a punishment i didn't cause. It happened just last game and disconnected me and we still won the ranked game, my teammates weren't bothered with the inactivity because they believe they are experiencing the issues also. I want something to happen to these queues. Maybe remove these 5? It's really frustrating how i still participate with no problem and help the team win and still get low priority queues. I don't want a reply saying you need to address this issue by fixing it in custom etc etc. I play for fun and mainly winning. I especially don't like it when teammates are afk and we lose from it. Those are the ones who should get severely punished.

Wanting a response asap. I'm not going to wait the 20 minutes x 5 out.

replies.body:
>We will not under any circumstances remove a low priority queue.

If you're not going to play a game until your low priority queue is removed, you're going to be waiting for a *really* long time.

What OS are you on and who's your ISP?
With Telstra/Bigpond. Mac OSX Mavericks 10.9.4 Never had a problem since last 2 updates
